name: goto_if_true
description:
Remove the top value on the stack, and if not `nil` or `false`, set the
   instruction pointer to the value specified by _location_.
related:
goto
   goto_if_false
   goto_if_nil
   goto_if_not_nil
   goto_if_undefined
   goto_if_not_undefined
   goto_if_equal
   goto_if_not_equal
